short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Opponent Rank in Sleeper app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will show the opponent rank value in the desktop version of Sleeper on the Matchup, Team, and Trending panels as well as on an individual player's detail window.

The rank value is color coded to help quickly identify what kind of opponent your player(s) will be up against.
